text.div:
Generated Narrative: CodeSystem BRDadoAusenteOuDesconhecido

Last updated: 2020-03-11 18:16:07+0000; Language: en

This case-sensitive code system http://www.saude.gov.br/fhir/r4/CodeSystem/BRDadoAusenteOuDesconhecido defines the following codes in an undefined hierarchy:

LvlCodeDisplayDefinitionPortuguese (Brazil) (pt)
1no-allergy-info No information about allergiesThere is no information available regarding the subject's allergy conditions.Nenhuma informação sobre alergias
1no-known-allergies No known allergiesThe subject has no known allergy conditions.Nenhuma alergia conhecida.
2  no-known-medication-allergies No known medication allergiesThe subject has no known medication allergy conditions.Nenhum medicamento para alergia conhecido.
2  no-known-environmental-allergies No known environmental allergiesThe subject has no known environmental allergy conditions.Nenhum fator ambiental conhecido para uma dada alergia.
2  no-known-food-allergies No known food allergiesThe subject has no known food allergy conditions.Nenhuma alergia alimentar conhecida.
1no-device-info No information about devicesThere is no information available regarding implanted or external devices for the subject.Nenhuma informação sobre algum dispositivo.
1no-known-devices No known devices in useThere are no devices known to be implanted in or used by the subject that have to be reported in this record. This can mean either that there are none known, or that those known are not relevant for the purpose of this record.Nenhum dispositivo em uso
1no-immunization-info No information about immunizationsThe subject's history of previous immunizations is not known.Nenhuma informação sobre imunização
1no-known-immunizations No known immunizationsThere is no history of previous immunizations for the subject that have to be reported in this record. This can mean either that there are none known, or that those known are not relevant for the purpose of this record.Nenhuma informação sobre imunização.
1no-medication-info No information about medicationsThere is no information available about the subject's medication use or administration.Sem informação de medicamentos.
1no-known-medications No known medicationsThere are no medications for the subject that have to be reported in this record. This can mean either that there are none known, or that those known are not relevant for the purpose of this record.Sem medicação.
1no-problem-info No information about problemsThere is no information available about the subject's health problems or disabilities.Nenhuma informação sobre o problema.
1no-known-problems No known problemsThe subject is not known to have any health problems or disabilities that have to be reported in this record. This can mean either that there are none known, or that those known are not relevant for the purpose of this record.Nenhum problema conhecido.
1no-procedure-info No information about past history of proceduresThere is no information available about the subject's past history of procedures.Nenhuma informação sobre procedimento.
1no-known-procedures No known proceduresThe subject has no history of procedures that have to be reported in this record. This can mean either that there are none known, or that those known are not relevant for the purpose of this record.Nenhum procedimento conhecido.

name: BRDadoAusenteOuDesconhecido
title: Classificação de dados ausentes ou desconhecidos - IPS
description: Classificação de dados conhecidos mas ausentes e de dados desconhecidos a partir do International Patient Summary - IPS.

concept.definition: There is no information available regarding the subject's allergy conditions.
The subject has no known allergy conditions.
The subject has no known medication allergy conditions.
The subject has no known environmental allergy conditions.

designation.value: Nenhum fator ambiental conhecido para uma dada alergia.

concept.definition: The subject has no known food allergy conditions.
There is no information available regarding implanted or external devices for the subject.

There are no devices known to be implanted in or used by the subject that have to be reported in this record. This can mean either that there are none known, or that those known are not relevant for the purpose of this record.
The subject's history of previous immunizations is not known.

There is no history of previous immunizations for the subject that have to be reported in this record. This can mean either that there are none known, or that those known are not relevant for the purpose of this record.
There is no information available about the subject's medication use or administration.
There are no medications for the subject that have to be reported in this record. This can mean either that there are none known, or that those known are not relevant for the purpose of this record.
There is no information available about the subject's health problems or disabilities.

The subject is not known to have any health problems or disabilities that have to be reported in this record. This can mean either that there are none known, or that those known are not relevant for the purpose of this record.

concept.display: No information about past history of procedures
concept.definition: There is no information available about the subject's past history of procedures.
The subject has no history of procedures that have to be reported in this record. This can mean either that there are none known, or that those known are not relevant for the purpose of this record.
